item.title: Yesterday Bar
item.description: The site for Yesterday - Die Bar provides a full experience for users to explore images and details of the drinks available at the bar.

item.title: ZOPYX
item.description: Specialists for large-scale Plone solutions, electronic publishing applications and individual Python software development since 2004

item.title: 4teamwork AG
item.description: State-of-the-art web applications for enterprise content management (ECM, CMS), intranet, records management (GEVER), and collaboration.

item.title: Each One Teach One
item.description: Each One Teach One, also known as EOTO, is a program for those who want to get to know students from different countries and learn different languages. Students teach each other their mother tongues and learn the language of their partner.

item.title: Quaive Social Intranet for the Synodal Council in Zurich
item.description: Quaive, a Plone-powered intranet platform, is pivotal in supporting the digital transition for the Catholic church in ZÃ¼rich.

item.title: QubicaAMF Portal
item.description: QubicaAMF Worldwide has sales offices all over the world. RedTurtle worked with QubicaAMF to completely redesign their web portal using Plone 5.

item.title: Plone for Non-Profits
item.description: Plone is the ideal web platform for non-profits, with its ease of use, security, and configurability by non-programmers.

item.title: Humanitas Volunteer Management Software
item.description: One of the main social services and community building organizations of the Netherlands uses Plone to securely coordinate volunteers with their projects without exposing private client information to volunteers outside the project.

item.title: operun webagentur
item.description: operun provides consulting, design and development for websites and applications based on Plone and Python.

item.title: Cambridge Drawing Society
item.description: A simple Plone site that allows non-technical Society members to manage their own portfolios

item.description: NO ZERO DAY EVER. Never. Nada. Zilch. 10 reasons behind an extraordinary security track record.
